code: import React from'react';import{useQuery}from'@tanstack/react-query';import{vendorsAPI}from'../services/api';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Vendors=()=>{const{data:vendors,isLoading}=useQuery({queryKey:['vendors'],queryFn:()=>vendorsAPI.getAll().then(res=>res.data)});if(isLoading){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"flex items-center justify-center h-64",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"animate-spin rounded-full h-12 w-12 border-b-2 border-railway-blue"})});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"space-y-6",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"border-b border-gray-200 pb-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-2xl font-bold text-gray-900",children:"Vendors"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"mt-1 text-sm text-gray-600",children:"Manage vendor information and performance"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3 gap-6",children:vendors===null||vendors===void 0?void 0:vendors.map(vendor=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card p-6",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex items-center justify-between mb-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"text-lg font-medium text-gray-900",children:vendor.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"text-sm text-gray-500",children:vendor.vendor_code})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"space-y-2",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"text-sm",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"text-gray-500",children:"Contact:"})," ",vendor.contact_person||'N/A']}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"text-sm",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"text-gray-500",children:"Phone:"})," ",vendor.phone||'N/A']}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"text-sm",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"text-gray-500",children:"Quality Rating:"})," ",vendor.quality_rating,"/5.0"]})]})]},vendor.id))})]});};export default Vendors;
